# DDMemoize news

## 1.0.0 (2018-01-07)

(identical to 1.0.0rc1)

## 1.0.0rc1 (2018-01-04)

Changes:

* Renamed telemetry to metrics

## 1.0.0a3 (2017-12-18)

Changes:

* Simplified telemetry support

## 1.0.0a2 (2017-12-10)

Features:

* Added telemetry support (#1)

Fixes:

* Fixed handling of objects that override `#equal?` (but why would you do that anyway?) (#2)

## 1.0.0a1 (2017-12-02)

Initial release.
